title: Feit Electric Smart WiFi Dimmer Switch with Remote, Single-Pole/3-Way/4-Way, Voice Control with Alexa & Google Asst, Wireless Wall-Mount Remote, App Control, Neutral Wire Required, DIM/BUTTON/WIFI
description: Experience convenient and versatile lighting control with the DIM/BUTTON/WIFI Dimmer Switch and Remote. Control non-smart dimmable bulbs from anywhere. Whether you're installing it in a single-pole or 3-way configuration, this dimmer seamlessly integrates into most home setups. Enjoy the flexibility of controlling your lights with or without Wi-Fi. The Feit Electric App provides intuitive features like scheduling, on/off control, grouping, and more. Add simple wireless control with the included portable remote, which can be placed anywhere for easy access. Designed for easy installation, the remote includes a decorative mounting plate that can be mounted anywhere using adhesive or placed over an existing wall box. The remote snaps into the decorative plate, for easy control you can take with you throughout the room. Compatible with Alexa and Google Assistant, this dimmer provides effortless voice control for your lighting. The dimmer supports incandescent bulbs up to 600W and LED bulbs up to 200W, providing ample power for various lighting needs. A neutral wire is required for installation of the wired dimmer.
product_category: Tools & Home Improvement›Electrical›Switches & Dimmers›Wall Switches›Dimmer Switches
feature_bullets: ✅ SMART WIFI DIMMER SWITCH – CUSTOMIZABLE LIGHTING CONTROL – Upgrade your home lighting with the Feit Electric Smart WiFi Dimmer Switch, designed to give you full control over your lights from anywhere. Adjust brightness levels effortlessly with the intuitive dimming function, ensuring the perfect ambiance for any setting. This smart dimmer switch provides seamless operation via app control, voice commands, or manual adjustment.

✅ MULTI-WAY SWITCHING – SINGLE-POLE AND 3-WAY COMPATIBILITY – Designed to work in various switch configurations, the Feit Electric Smart Dimmer supports single-pole and 3-way setups, making it perfect for controlling lights in multiple rooms or large spaces. Whether you’re replacing an existing switch or installing a new one, this smart dimmer ensures smooth compatibility with your home’s wiring.

✅ HANDS-FREE VOICE CONTROL WITH ALEXA & GOOGLE ASSISTANT – Enjoy the convenience of hands-free control with Amazon Alexa or Google Assistant. Simply use voice commands to turn lights on or off, adjust brightness levels, or create custom lighting scenes without lifting a finger. Whether you’re entering a dark room or relaxing on the couch, the Feit Electric Smart Dimmer makes lighting effortless and intuitive.

✅ WIRELESS APP CONTROL – CONTROL YOUR LIGHTS FROM ANYWHERE – Take full control of your home's lighting from your smartphone or tablet with the Feit Electric app. Whether you’re at home, at work, or on vacation, you can turn lights on or off, adjust brightness, and set schedules or timers with just a few taps. Schedule lights to turn on before you arrive or set them to automatically adjust at different times of the day for energy savings and enhanced security.

✅ EASY INSTALLATION WITH NEUTRAL WIRE REQUIRED & UNIVERSAL FIT – Designed for DIY installation, this smart dimmer switch fits standard wall plates and requires a neutral wire for operation. Works with existing single-pole or 3-way/4-way configurations by replacing one of the traditional switches. The included wireless remote switch mounts anywhere with no wiring needed, making it easy to upgrade your home without complex rewiring.

✅ 1-YEAR MANUFACTURER WARRANTY FOR PEACE OF MIND – Backed by over 45 years of Feit Electric’s lighting expertise, this Dimmer Switch Remote comes with a 1-year manufacturer warranty, ensuring reliability and performance you can trust. With Feit Electric’s US-based customer support, you’ll receive expert assistance whenever needed. Experience high-quality lighting control from a brand known for innovation and excellence!
